price: O gün, Allah onlara hak ettikleri cezayı tam olarak verecektir ve onlar da Allah'ın hiç şüphesiz hak olduğunu bileceklerdir.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يُوَفِّيهِمُ ٱللَّهُ دِينَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yuwaffīhimu al-lahu dīnahumu al-ḥaqa wayaʿlamūna anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu al-mubīnu
translations: Allah will pay them in full
Allah will pay them in full
